articles.author: Christian Orozco
articles.title: Shutdown silver linings for the Democrats and Europe's hi-tech drone war: Morning Rundown - NBC News
articles.description: Democrats are torn on what the party's senators got out of the shutdown deal.
articles.content: Democrats are torn on what the party's senators got out of the shutdown deal. A Latvian company attempts to solve Europe's Russian drone problem. And, the S&P 500 index is on track to broadly und… [+9140 chars]
